column1: The folks from the World Health Organization who provide information about COVID19 show they're grounded, intelligent, ethical, educated, informed, and have an excellent capacity to communicate. The Trump administration folks responsible for COVID19 info don't even come close.
Holy shit... If anyone wonders how COVID19 can negatively impact the USA's healthcare system, this is just one small early-day example. -_-
So here's a thing regarding #Covid19 in the USA. The Trump admin isn't discussing what they know they don't know, by not discussing some data they do know. And that's bad. Here's what it means... 1/3
